mapper.select: {call proc_cardList(#{p_mem_id, mode=IN }, #{r_list, mode=OUT, jdbcType=CURSOR, javaType=java.sql.ResultSet, resultMap=r_list})}

select max(bin_company) as bin_company,max(cd.card_num) as card_num, max(bin_name) as bin_name,max(mem_id) as mem_id, sum(ph_price) as ph_price, max(pay_date) as pay_date from pay_history ph, payment pm, creditcard cd, cardbin cb where ph.pay_num = pm.pay_num and cd.bin = cb.bin and pm.card_num = cd.card_num and to_date(pm.pay_date,'yy/mm/dd') >= to_date(substr(to_date(sysdate, 'yy/MM/DD'),0,6)||01) and mem_id = #{mem_id} group by bin_company
select m.mem_id ,card_num, bin_company, bin_name ,mem_pw from creditcard cc, cardbin c ,member m where cc.bin=c.bin and M.MEM_ID = CC.MEM_ID and m.mem_id = #{mem_id}

select pm.pay_date, pm.pay_time, ph.ph_price, s.store_num, s.store_name from payment pm, pay_history ph,store s where pm.pay_num = ph.pay_num and pm.store_num = s.store_num and to_date(pay_date,'yy/mm/dd') >= to_date(substr(to_date(sysdate, 'yy/MM/DD'),0,6)||01) and card_num = #{card_num} order by pay_date desc, pay_time
